item.title: A message from the divine
item.description: I had chills down my spine You see, I was just about to kiss her After I had had a sip of my wine But the morning breeze woke me up Somebody left open the window blind I feel I've fallen in love As I feast now on the brilliance of ripe sunshine Embracing me with its comforting warmth Takes me back to the good ol' time Past the heartbreaks.
